attributes.action: Make price gouging illegal during national crisis
attributes.additional_details: Profiteering from an emergency is abhorrent and needs curtailment
attributes.background: Prevent retailers from profiting during national crisis by charging customers more for household items

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/30

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
